sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button @click="onClick()" :style="{ background: color }" class="btn">{{ text }}</button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "Button",
  props: {
    text: String,
    color: String,
  },
  methods:{
    onClick(){
        this.$emit('show-add-task')
    },
  },
};
</script>
